content:
You're absolutely right - the PURE_AI_LANGUAGE Template is a critical foundational document that should be included. Let me update the introduction prompt to include this: 

The introduction prompt has been updated to include the PURE_AI_LANGUAGE Template as one of the key foundational documents. This is indeed essential since it defines the structured communication protocols that will be used throughout the project.

With this update, you're all set to create the new ATLAS team chat. The ATLAS member will have all the necessary context to provide informed recommendations on repository structure and code organization.

Is there anything else you'd like me to adjust or explain before you proceed with creating the new chat?
